TEST_NAME: Interactive Grid Columns aliases are unique
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapi as (select row_number( ) over (partition by application_id,page_id,region_id,trim(lower(source_expression)) order by display_sequence nulls last) value_dup_cnt,
                   application_id,
                   page_id,
                   region_id,
                   region_name,
                   heading,
                   source_expression,
                   display_sequence,
                   last_updated_by,
                   last_updated_on,
                   build_option,
                   name,
                   item_type,
                   label,
                   parent_column_id,
                   column_id,
							     workspace
              from apex_appl_page_ig_columns
              where item_type not in ('NATIVE_HIDDEN','NATIVE_ROW_SELECTOR','NATIVE_ROW_ACTION')
            )
select case when (trim(aapi.heading) is null
            or lower(trim(aapi.heading)) = ' ') 
       then 'N' 
       else 'Y'
       end pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column alias for `%3` (app %1, page %2) is not unique. Column headings must be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapi.heading, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => source_expression) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column alias for `%3` (app %1, page %2) is not unique', 
        p0 => aapi.heading, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => source_expression) issue_title,
       aapi.column_id component_id,
       aapi.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapi.heading,
       aapi.label,
       aapi.item_type,
       aapi.name,
       aapi.source_expression,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 'Y'.3.1 Info and Relationships, 2.4.6 Headings and Labels, 2.5.3 Label in Name, 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions, 4.1.2 Name, Role, ValueChecking that all apex object (regions, items, report column headings) are labeled appropriately
